pageProduct.name: Thompsons Multivital 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Multivital supports general wellbeing. Traditionally used in Western Herbal medicine as a body tonic.

Warnings

ALWAYS READ THE LABEL. FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS FOR USE. If symptoms persist, talk to your heath professional. Contains: ethanol 18% v/v. Adults Only. Contains 4mg of caffeine per 5 mL dose. A cup of instant coffee contains approx. 80mg of caffeine. Caffeine intake more than 200mg per day is not recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding.

Common Uses

Thompson's Multivital is formulated with a blend of herbs traditionally used in Western herbal medicine as a body tonic and to support general health & wellbeing. It contains Gentian, which has been used in traditional Western herbal medicine to stimulate gastric secretions & works as a digestive tonic to improve digestive weakness.
Other herbal ingredients like Ginkgo, Ginger and Echinacea reduce free radicals formed in the body and help decrease their damage to body cells.

Ingredients

 Each 5mL does contains:                                                        

Astragalus membranaceus (Astragalus) ext.......100mg
derived from dry root..................................500mg
Centella asiatica (Gotu Kola) ext....................16.7mg
derived from dry leaf.............................166.75mg
Cynara scolymus (Globe Artichoke) ext...........41.7mg
derived from dry leaf.............................166.75mg
Echinacea purpurea (Echinacea) ext. .................21mg
derived from dry herb flowering tops.............105mg
Echinacea purpurea (Echinacea) ext........23.4microlitre
derived from dry root.................................11.7mg
Eleutherococcus senticosus (Siberian Ginseng) ext. 20mg
derived from dry root..................................200mg
Gentiana lutea (Gentian) ext.................66.7microlitre
derived from dry root...............................33.35mg              

Ginkgo biloba (Maidenhair Tree) ext.................6.7mg
derived from dry leaf...............................332.5mg
Glycyrrhiza glabra (Liquorice) ext...................62.5mg
derived from dry root..................................250mg
Ilex paraguariensis (Yerba Mate) ext..............66.7mg
derived from dry leaf...............................333.3mg
Smilax ornata (Sarsaparilla) ext. ...................83.3mg
derived from dry root..............................333.2mg
Urtica dioica (Nettle) ext. ..................................1mL
derived from dry herb.................................500mg
Zingiber officinale (Ginger) ext. .............66.7microlitre
derived from dry rhizome.........................33.35mg

Directions

Adults – Take 5mL in a small quantity of water or juice three times daily, or as professionally prescribed. SHAKE WELL BEFORE USE.
